citation: Gaming Control Amendment (Future Gaming Market) Act 2021 (Tas)
text:
Gaming Control Amendment (Future Gaming Market) Act 2021

An Act to amend the Gaming Control Act 1993 and the TT-Line Gaming Act 1993
[Royal Assent 16 December 2021]

Be it enacted by Her Excellency the Governor of Tasmania, by and with the advice and consent of the Legislative Council and House of Assembly, in Parliament assembled, as follows:

PART 1 - Preliminary

1. Short title
    This Act may be cited as the Gaming Control Amendment (Future Gaming Market) Act 2021 .

2. Commencement
        (1) Except as provided by this section, this Act commences on the day on which this Act receives the Royal Assent.
        (2) Part 3 commences on 1 July 2022.
        (3) Parts 4 and 5 commence on 1 July 2023.

PART 2 - Gaming Control Act 1993 Amended

3.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Gaming Control Act 1993 .

PART 6 - Repeal of Act

191. Repeal of Act
    This Act is repealed on the first anniversary of the day on which the last uncommenced provision of this Act commenced.
